meanings.definition: One who stares in a fixed way.
meanings.sent1: The starer in the classroom never blinked during the test.
meanings.sent2: The old man was known as the neighborhood starer, always looking out his window.
meanings.sent3: The starer at the movie theater missed the entire film because he was lost in thought.
meanings.sent4: The starer's eyes were like lasers, boring into the back of my head.
meanings.sent5: The starer's fixed gaze made me wonder if he was a statue come to life.
